message: Let's start with a simple split - 60/40. I believe it's a fair offer to kick things off.
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor, Alice. Let's be a bit more equitable. How about this split?
Bob, I understand you want to be equitable, but time is literally money in this game.  I'll meet you halfway on the split, but let's settle this before inflation eats our profits.
